setting.playlist.normal.name: Sound playlist
setting.playlist.normal.hint: The name of the playlist of sounds to select from when a non-roll chat message is received.
setting.playlist.rolls.name: Roll sound playlist
setting.playlist.rolls.hint: The name of the playlist of sounds to select from when a dice roll message is received.
setting.playerType.normal.name: Sound selection mode
setting.playerType.normal.hint:
The mode for choosing sounds to play when a regular message is received.
Random will choose a random sound in the playlist each time a message is received. Sequential will choose the sounds in the playlist order and loop back around when it reaches the end. Silent will disable the chat sounds entirely.
setting.playerType.rolls.name: Roll sound selection mode
setting.playerType.rolls.hint:
The mode for choosing sounds to play when a regular message is received.
Random will choose a random sound in the playlist each time a message is received. Sequential will choose the sounds in the playlist order and loop back around when it reaches the end. Silent will disable the chat sounds entirely.
